data.title: Molly's Cafe
data.text: Molly's has a great selection of American food.. Very nice ambiance, friendly people working there. Food is great cooked to order .

data.title: Good and Hearty
data.text:
We were early for a business meeting with a client and, after some searching, stopped here for a quick breakfast.

When we arrived at 8:15 AM, the place was pretty empty, except for a table of three older gentlemen. We grabbed a booth and the waitress promptly brought us menus, coffee and place settings. Our orders taken (one vegetarian omelet, one corned beef hash and scrambled eggs) and we settled in to watch the news and catch up on business emails. 

Our food arrived in about 10 minutes and was good and hot and hearty. If you think of a cross between what Mom used to make and hearty diner food, you'll be pretty spot on. As we were there for breakfast, I can't comment on dinner or lunch options although the menu supported both. By about 9:20 there were additional diners and business picked up.

The decor is definitely "retro" or "route 66" depending upon how you look at it. The waitress was pleasant and attentive and made sure our coffee's were constantly re-filled. We don't visit downtown San Bernardino so this was a bit of an impulse stop as we weren't really certain of what else was in the neighborhood close to our client's offices. I'm glad we dropped in here though. The food was good!

data.title: 1950's style diner
data.text: Nice diner vibe and food with mexican food as well.  Fast service and neighborhood feel in downtown San Bernardino.

data.title: It was okay
data.text: I had the egg benedicts and they were okay. I've had better. The yolk isn't running which i thought was odd, but maybe they make them different here. The pancakes were good, the milkshakes are good, and my friend had the stuffed french toast and it looked disappointing.

data.title: Visit
data.text: Had breakfast their food was great. Plenty of parking. Restrooms very clean. Staff very friendly,will return.

data.title: Good comfort food in ample portions.
data.text: Nostalgic diner downtown San Bernardino (Route 66). Good food, ample portions with many photos and Route 66 memorabilia. A must stop for a journey back in time with good diner cooking.

data.title: Should be good but just isn't!
data.text: The choices for downtown eateries are dismal, Mollys has been a staple in the downtown route 66 area for many many moons! Unfortunately it just doesn't make the cut! It is not very clean and the food although large portions it is very pricey. So if your in the area and more than likely there is no other place to eat, try you you might like but for me I'll pass!

data.title: Good Eats and Memories
data.text: Great old-fashioned diner right with Route 66. Portions are generous and delicious. I particularly love the Chili Verde burrito. Hamburgers and daily specials are good as well.

data.title: good food
data.text: Good food and they give u alot...tastes like down home cooking to me. Servers are always friendly...Mexican food and american food. yummy!

data.title: Great place to eat lunch in downtown San Berdo
data.text: Always have to stop in and get a bite from here when I have jury duty. Very close to court house and downtown businesses. It was quite crowded due to the lunch rush so I had a seat at the counter since I was alone. Friendly service and good food. I ordered the lunch special of 1/2 sandwich and salad. It was a good size and very tasty. Have had other dishes here in the past like breakfast and it has always been great!

data.title: good time
data.text: great chile rellenos and enchiladas great margarritas yummy !! and staff is special way to go mitla cafe

data.title: Yummy food
data.text: I had some very interesting stuffed French toast with a couple slices of bacon and two eggs. The toast was like nothing I'd ever tasted, and I really enjoyed it. The server was friendly and efficient, the coffee was good and hot. The prices are fair. Nice quiet little spot in the heart of the downtown.

data.title: Breakfast was spoiled by the dark room and a loud television
data.text: Breakfast should be fun.  It should be awakening.  This place doesn't meet the criteria.  The room may be great for drinks in the evening, but for breakfast the place sucks.  It is dark.  When the sunlight comes in from the front windows, one notices the dust.  The coffee is only so-so.  Their prices are high for what is offered.  The "french toast" was just bread!  I won't be going back.  For your information, the Yum Yum place is just up the street and is a far brighter spot!

data.title: Gross....
data.text: I joined a friend for breakfast at this place, I was 100% dissatisfied with my breakfast. The pancakes are horrible, how can you mess up breakfast?

data.title: A good place for lunch downtown
data.text: Downtown San Bernardino has very few options for lunch except for fast food.  Molly's Cafe is one exception and it's absolutely worth a try.  They serve a nice breakfast all day and there is a very extensive menu.  Whether you'd like the aforementioned breakfast, a sandwich, burger, salad, soup, or Mexican food; Molly's has it.  There is something for everybody.  The food is good, service is attentive, and it's got character.  It's certainly preferable to the fast food which is your only other real choice.  Give Molly's a try if you find yourself in downtown San Bernardino.

data.title: Best in Downtown
data.text:
I like the decor and the service, prompt and efficient.
The good is very good across the board. I eat here at least once a month and had breakfast and dinner.
No down side here. Outside dining as well.

data.title: Neighborhood Diner/Cafe
data.text: I came here with my family because they experienced good quality food. Today the experience was very different. Biscuits and gravy was way too salty. The bacon half cooked, cornbeef hash overcooked and overlycrunchy/burnt. They gave us somebody else's dining check. As a first timer here. Probably wouldn't return. The staff was friendly but life's too short to eat crappy food. No consistency here. Can't take another chance it would be poor!!

data.title: muy lindo lugar
data.text: muy lindo y limpio.la atencion muy buena.lo recomiendo .no hay que esperar mucho para que no atiendan
